scenarios.title: CAC spike after competitor promo (no comparative claims)
Transfer delays creating trust crisis
Price increase causes volume decline; retailers push competitors
Checkout abandonment spikes due to delivery uncertainty
Trial-to-paid stuck; usage drops after Day 3
Telecom promo fatigue; opt-outs rising
Education leads high but enrollments falling (trust gap)
Wellness brand cannot make strong claims (compliance constraint)
B2B deals stall after proposal; stakeholders go quiet
Hospitality reviews drop; corporate bookings decline
Creator growth plateau; shares dropping
Donations spike then disappear (no retention model)
Insurance quote starts high; policy completion low
Logistics on-time is good but complaints persist (perception gap)
Real estate: tours happen, closes don’t (trust/financing friction)
Ride cancellations rising due to driver shortage
Utilities: prepaid customers distrust meter readings
Agritech: sign-ups growing but usage near zero (low digital literacy)
Payments: merchant onboarding stalls at KYB compliance stage
Pharma: trust low due to counterfeits; awareness high
Travel: search traffic up, bookings down (fee shock at payment)
Gaming: installs high, Day-1 retention poor (tutorial dropoff)
Luxury fashion: premium brand, low online conversion (trust gap)
Food delivery: repeat orders drop after first promo (promo dependency)
Recruitment: applicants high, quality low (signal-to-noise problem)
Edtech: course completion collapsing (drop at week 2)
Public campaign: high reach, zero behavior change (low trust + misinformation)
Manufacturing: distributors delay orders due to cashflow fears
Micro-lending: repayments drop after month 1 (defaults rising)
Repositioning: brand known for one thing, launching new category

experiments.title: Proof-led vs offer-led acquisition creative
experiments.hypothesis: Proof-led messaging reduces CAC by improving qualified conversion without comparative claims.

experiments.title: KYC step order: short-first vs full-first
experiments.hypothesis: Short-first KYC increases completion and overall conversion.

experiments.title: In-app status banner vs silent handling
experiments.hypothesis: Proactive transparency reduces tickets and churn during delays.

experiments.title: Support SLA page + expectation setting
experiments.hypothesis: Clear expectations improve trust even when performance varies.

experiments.title: Bundle value messaging vs unit value messaging
experiments.hypothesis: Bundle framing protects volume without heavy discounting.

experiments.title: Retail compliance incentive tiers
experiments.hypothesis: Tiered incentives lift numeric distribution more efficiently than flat incentives.

experiments.title: Show delivery ETA on PDP vs at checkout
experiments.hypothesis: Earlier certainty reduces checkout abandonment.

experiments.title: Flat delivery fee vs threshold free-delivery
experiments.hypothesis: Simpler shipping policy increases conversion even if AOV changes.

experiments.title: Task-based onboarding vs guided tour
experiments.hypothesis: Task-based onboarding improves Aha completion and retention.

experiments.title: Upgrade prompt at value moment vs end-of-trial
experiments.hypothesis: Value-moment upsell increases trial-to-paid without harming trust.

experiments.title: Frequency cap vs no cap
experiments.hypothesis: Reducing message frequency lowers opt-outs without reducing sales.

experiments.title: Segmented relevance messaging vs generic promos
experiments.hypothesis: Segmented messages restore attention and engagement.

experiments.title: Proof pack nurture vs discount-led nurture
experiments.hypothesis: Proof-first reduces objections and increases enrollments.

experiments.title: WhatsApp objection-handling sequence
experiments.hypothesis: Structured objection handling increases conversion from leads.

experiments.title: Education-first landing vs direct CTA landing
experiments.hypothesis: Education-first increases trust and improves CVR under claim limits.

experiments.title: Routine-builder lifecycle vs promo lifecycle
experiments.hypothesis: Routine-building increases repeat purchases without claims.

experiments.title: Champion kit vs standard follow-up
experiments.hypothesis: Champion enablement reduces cycle length and increases closes.

experiments.title: Pilot offer vs full contract
experiments.hypothesis: Pilot lowers perceived risk and improves proposal acceptance.

experiments.title: In-stay micro-feedback vs post-stay feedback
experiments.hypothesis: In-stay feedback catches issues early and lifts ratings.

experiments.title: Corporate SLA messaging vs promo messaging
experiments.hypothesis: SLA clarity restores corporate demand better than discounts.

experiments.title: Hook style A vs B (curiosity vs utility)
experiments.hypothesis: A stronger hook improves shares without sacrificing watch time.

experiments.title: Series format vs standalone posts
experiments.hypothesis: Series increases returning viewers and compounding reach.

experiments.title: Impact receipt email vs thank-you only
experiments.hypothesis: Impact receipts increase repeat donations.

experiments.title: Monthly subscription prompt timing (Day 3 vs Day 14)
experiments.hypothesis: Early subscription ask increases recurring conversion.

experiments.title: Short quote form vs full quote form
experiments.hypothesis: Less friction increases completion and purchase intent.

experiments.title: Claims-story proof section vs generic benefits section
experiments.hypothesis: Real proof improves conversion at the final step.

experiments.title: Tracking clarity upgrade vs existing tracking
experiments.hypothesis: Higher certainty reduces complaints even if delivery is unchanged.

experiments.title: Proactive delay alerts vs reactive support
experiments.hypothesis: Proactive alerts cut tickets and improve trust.

experiments.title: Proof dossier nurture vs lifestyle nurture
experiments.hypothesis: Compliance/title proof lifts close rate more than lifestyle content.

experiments.title: Financing pathway offer vs standard payment plan
experiments.hypothesis: Clear financing options reduce decision paralysis.

experiments.title: ETA transparency UI vs current ETA UI
experiments.hypothesis: Honest ETAs reduce cancellations and complaints.

experiments.title: Reliability zones pilot vs citywide defaults
experiments.hypothesis: Zoned reliability improves experience where supply is strongest.

experiments.title: Usage breakdown messaging vs none
experiments.hypothesis: Education reduces distrust and increases top-ups.

experiments.title: Community demo sessions vs SMS-only education
experiments.hypothesis: Trust transfer via community leaders improves sentiment.

experiments.title: Voice-note tips vs text tips
experiments.hypothesis: Voice notes increase engagement for low literacy cohorts.

experiments.title: Agent-led onboarding vs self-serve onboarding
experiments.hypothesis: Agent onboarding increases activation and repeat usage.

experiments.title: Guided KYB checklist UI vs current flow
experiments.hypothesis: Clarity reduces drop-off and speeds time-to-live.

experiments.title: WhatsApp pre-check vs no pre-check
experiments.hypothesis: Pre-check reduces rework and boosts completion.

experiments.title: Verification CTA campaign vs generic brand campaign
experiments.hypothesis: Authenticity cues improve conversion where counterfeits exist.

experiments.title: Retail trust program pilot vs no program
experiments.hypothesis: Retailer enablement improves consumer confidence and sell-through.

experiments.title: Total price upfront vs late price reveal
experiments.hypothesis: Transparency reduces payment-stage dropoffs.

experiments.title: Flexible payment options vs single payment
experiments.hypothesis: Payment flexibility increases bookings amid fee volatility.

experiments.title: Short tutorial vs long tutorial
experiments.hypothesis: Shorter tutorial increases Day-1 retention.

experiments.title: Early win reward vs standard pacing
experiments.hypothesis: Early reward increases return likelihood.

experiments.title: Concierge-first checkout vs standard checkout
experiments.hypothesis: Concierge reduces uncertainty and increases conversion for premium buyers.

experiments.title: Returns clarity block vs no clarity block
experiments.hypothesis: Clear returns policy increases confidence and checkout completion.

experiments.title: Reorder shortcut UI vs promo push
experiments.hypothesis: Convenience increases repeat orders while protecting margin.

experiments.title: Taste-profile onboarding vs generic home feed
experiments.hypothesis: Personalization increases repeat without heavier discounts.

experiments.title: Self-selection quiz gate vs open apply
experiments.hypothesis: Quiz gate reduces noise and increases qualified applicants.

experiments.title: Role realism preview vs standard JD
experiments.hypothesis: Realism improves fit and reduces low-quality volume ethically.

experiments.title: Cohort-based pacing vs self-paced
experiments.hypothesis: Cohorts increase completion through community accountability.

experiments.title: Micro-certificates per module vs end-only certificate
experiments.hypothesis: Micro-credentials increase motivation and progression.

experiments.title: Champion-led activation vs media-led activation
experiments.hypothesis: Trust transfer improves behavior change where misinformation exists.

experiments.title: Action-step SMS sequence vs single announcement
experiments.hypothesis: Stepwise guidance reduces friction and increases action.

experiments.title: Sell-through support vs discount incentives
experiments.hypothesis: Sell-through support increases reorder frequency sustainably.

experiments.title: Flexible reorder terms pilot vs standard terms
experiments.hypothesis: Flex terms reduce ordering delays without margin collapse.

experiments.title: Repayment habit plan onboarding vs standard onboarding
experiments.hypothesis: Habit setup increases repayment consistency.

experiments.title: Hardship pathway messaging vs generic reminders
experiments.hypothesis: Ethical hardship options reduce defaults and complaints.

experiments.title: Bridge narrative (core→new) vs new-only narrative
experiments.hypothesis: Bridge story increases consideration without alienating loyalists.

experiments.title: Sampling/experience activation vs digital-only launch
experiments.hypothesis: Experience-led proof accelerates trial and adoption for new category.
